DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate muscle activity gluteus medius tensor fascia lata health control group patient PFPS submaximal isometric muscle contraction.The research question : Is difference muscle activity gluteus medius tensor fascia lata health control group patient PFPS submaximal isometric muscle contraction ？Null hypothesis : There difference muscle activity gluteus medius tensor fascia lata health control group patient PFPS submaximal isometric muscle contraction .
DOC.brief_title: Investigation Muscle Activity Pattern Gluteus Medius Tensor Fascia Lata Patients With PFPS
DOC.detailed_description: Basic data - Name , age , sex , BW , BH , pain VAS scale（VAS-activity） , affected side , dominate leg , symptom duration , activity level Measurement - Flexibility iliotibial band：Ober test - EMG data collection 8 submaximal muscle contraction - Muscle strength measurement hip abductor
DOC.criteria: 2050 year old Insidious onset symptom Pain exist least 3 month , VAS activity > 4 Two follow activity induce pain anterior retropatellar site prolong sit , stairclimbing , squat , run , kneel , hopping/jumping Diagnosed orthopedic surgeon History low extremity fracture operation Neurological disease involve Observed knee deformity Other welldefined musculoskeletal problem low extremity
